nodes.text: Nelva Stato was a female Human who lived during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. A merchant like her relatives Meridat, Felusia, and Clem, Nelva Stato sold furniture and decorations on the space station Carrick Station with Nelva.

A Decorations vendor who appears on the Republic Fleet, Nelva Stato was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds. While her fellow merchants Clem Stato and Estah Kloy appear on both the Imperial and Republic Fleets, Nelva Stato is replaced by Meridat Stato on the Imperial Fleet.
